thread.section_title: Babypark Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Babypark | www.babypark.nl | 4 van 204
thread.title: Thanasis Spyridonis

author: Thanasis Spyridonis
title: Thanasis Spyridonis
text: Nicely organized store, fully equipped with options and a well trained personnel that can happily spend several hours helping you find what you need. Excellent customer service, flexibility with the appointments of the delivery, punctuality and speed/efficiency during setup of the installations. I could not recommend it more! Will definitely come back
